messages.message:
Bumping this up. While this is late, this is how I fixed it:
```sudo apt update
sudo apt install redis-server ```

Oh, to fix this, add `redis-server` to the Dockerfile here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/third-party/crafting/docker/ibdev.Dockerfile), and follow the instructions here to push a new base image (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/third-party/crafting/docker/README.md)
